mapper.select: select distinct instanceclassguid from bi_view_history a, sa_businessobject b, sa_group c where a.instanceboguid = b.guid and b.bmguid = c.bmguid and c.guid = #GROUPGUID# and a.createuser = #CREATEUSER#
select * from bi_view_history a where a.instanceguid = #INSTANCEGUID# and a.createuser = #CREATEUSER#
select * from bi_view_history a where a.createuser = #CREATEUSER#
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BI_VIEW_HISTORY (INSTANCEGUID, INSTANCECLASSGUID, INSTANCEBOGUID, CREATEUSER, CREATETIME) values (#INSTANCEGUID#, #INSTANCECLASSGUID#, #INSTANCEBOGUID#, #CREATEUSER#, #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#)
mapper.update: UPDATE BI_VIEW_HISTORY SET CREATETIME = #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP# WHERE INSTANCEGUID = #INSTANCEGUID# AND CREATEUSER = #CREATEUSER#
mapper.delete: delete from bi_view_history where instanceguid = #INSTANCEGUID# and createuser = #CREATEUSER#
